models.nudges: An outbound message sent to encourage engagement—either scheduled (morning focus, evening prompt) or triggered (wins celebration, welcome back after absence). Always warm, never guilt-inducing.
models.celebrations: A record of when a Win was celebrated with the celebration overlay. Captures the moment of recognition and encouragement.
models.nudgePreferences: User settings that control when and how nudges are delivered—timing, frequency, and which types are enabled.

relationships: Nudges may reference a Win when celebrating an achievement
Celebrations always link to a specific Win that was recognized
NudgePreferences control which types of Nudges get sent

nudges.message: Good morning! What's the one thing that would make today a win?
Day's winding down. Anything worth celebrating today?
You did it! That's 3 weeks of consistent workouts. Your body thanks you.
Hey, haven't heard from you in a few days. No pressure—just checking in. Ready when you are.
nudges.actionTaken: Opened app and did quick check-in

nudges.message: New week, fresh start. What's one small thing you can do for yourself today?
Look at you! Published that newsletter draft you've been sitting on. That took courage.
4-week streak on Mental Health! You're building something real here.

celebrations.encouragement: Consistency beats perfection. You're proving that every week.
Shipping beats perfecting. Your voice matters.

celebrations.winTitle: Had difficult conversation with team member
celebrations.encouragement: Leadership isn't easy. You showed up anyway.

celebrations.winTitle: Played board game with Ian for an hour
celebrations.encouragement: He won't remember the game. He'll remember you were there.

celebrations.winTitle: Took a real lunch break outside
celebrations.encouragement: Small acts of self-care add up. This counts.
